examples.translation: 她撇去了汤上的大部分浮油。
examples.last: the soup to remove most of the fat.

examples.translation: 气垫船能掠过水面飞速行驶。

n: a thin layer covering the surface of a liquid
adj: used of milk and milk products from which the cream has been removed
v: travel on the surface of water
move or pass swiftly and lightly over the surface of

vi: 掠过,覆盖了一层浮沫,侵吞钱财
adj: 撇去浮沫的,由脱脂乳做的
vt: 撇去浮沫,略读,掠过,滑过
